The holy appostle and doctour of the peple saynt Poule sayth in his epystle. Alle that is wryten is wryten vnto our doctryne and for our lernyng ... De ludo scachorum. English Jacobus, de Cassolis, fl. 1288-1322. Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.
[168] p. : ill.
Printed by William Caxton, [Westminster : 1483]
A translation by William Caxton, primarily from a French version by Jean de Vignay, of: Cessolis, Jacobus de. De ludo scachorum. Title from opening words of text, a2r. Imprint from STC; colophon reads "Explicit per Caxton". Signatures: a-i k-l⁶. The first leaf is blank. With different preliminaries from the 1474 edition. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
The holy appostle and doctour of the peple saynt Poule sayth in his epystle. Alle that is wryten is wryten vnto our doctryne and for our lernyng ... De ludo scachorum. English Jacobus, de Cassolis, fl. 1288-1322. Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.
[168] p. : ill.
Printed by William Caxton, [Westminster : 1483]
A translation by William Caxton, primarily from a French version by Jean de Vignay, of: Cessolis, Jacobus de. De ludo scachorum. Title from opening words of text, a2r. Imprint from STC; colophon reads "Explicit per Caxton". Signatures: a-i k-l⁶. The first leaf is blank. With different preliminaries from the 1474 edition. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
William Caxton
